title: AI in Construction Training Course (Lesson 2/7) - Foundations of AI
description:
Discover the foundations of AI technologies and gain a clear understanding of how AI applications are transforming the AEC industry. This lesson is essential for anyone in civil engineering, structural design, architecture, or construction project management who wants to build a strong knowledge base in artificial intelligence and its practical applications.

📚 What You'll Learn in This Lesson:
The History of AI: Trace the evolution of artificial intelligence from its conceptual beginnings in the 1800s to its modern-day applications in construction and engineering.
Demystifying Definitions and Terminology: Learn the key terms and concepts that underpin AI technology, making it accessible for professionals in architecture and civil engineering.
Overview of Foundational AI Technologies: Understand the technologies driving AI, including how they are shaping construction project workflows and structural engineering analysis.
AI Models: Training and Deployment: Get a glimpse into the process of training and deploying AI models and their use in design optimization, site management, and more.
🕒 Lesson Details:
Duration: 30 minutes
Type: Theory
This session provides a deep dive into the essential concepts that make artificial intelligence in construction a game-changer for professionals in the AEC industry.

🚀 Why Watch This Lesson?
Understanding the foundations of AI is critical for leveraging its potential in construction project management, building design, and structural engineering innovations. Whether you're an architect, civil engineer, or construction manager, this lesson sets the stage for exploring the transformative power of AI in construction and design.

🔗 Subscribe now to continue learning about the latest advancements in AI for construction, civil engineering tools, and architectural technology.

💡 Unlock the potential of artificial intelligence to enhance your career and reshape how the AEC industry works.
